entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 3. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 17. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Monday 24 April 2023
